column3: Latest;Kampot Province------: ------ Provincial police in cooperation with the Teuk Chhou district Inspectorate arrested a suspected drug dealer on November 14
column7: a 25-year-old male was caught with 5 packages of drugs on his person.------The suspect is being charged with trafficking
column8: and a case is being prepared for court.------https://tvfb.news/article/16043
